items.name: Master Round
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Master Round
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Master Round
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Master Round
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Master Round
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Prime Primer
items.effect: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.

items.name: Arcane Gunpowder
items.effect: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past, cannot be used.

items.name: Planar Lead
items.effect: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.

items.name: Obsidian Shell Casing
items.effect: Ingredient for the Bullet That Can Kill The Past.

items.name: Meatbun
items.effect: Single use. Heals the player for one heart. Grants double damage until the player takes damage.

items.name: Medkit
items.effect: Single use. Heals the player for 4 hearts.

items.name: Ration
items.effect: Single use. Heals the player for two hearts. Automatically used if the player runs out of health.

items.name: Orange
items.effect: Single use. Fully heals the player, grants a heart container, and increases coolness by 2.

items.name: Friendship Cookie
items.effect: Single use. Resurrects your co-op partner with full health.

items.name: Bottle
items.effect: Holds hearts or ammo for use later.

items.name: Bomb
items.effect: Throws a bomb that explodes after a short delay.

items.name: Ice Bomb
items.effect: Throws a bomb that freezes enemies.

items.name: Chaff Grenade
items.effect: Stuns enemies. Can be used to steal items from shops.

items.name: Proximity Mine
items.effect: Places a mine that explodes when an enemy comes near it.

items.name: Cluster Mine
items.effect: Places 5 small mines that explode when an enemy comes into contact with them.

items.name: C4
items.effect: Places explosives on the ground which then can be detonated by using the item again.

items.name: Weird Egg
items.effect: Using the egg while missing health fully heals the player. Dropping the egg and shooting it spawns a gun, item, or yolk creature. Dropping the egg into fire spawns a serpent.

items.name: Molotov
items.effect: Throws a Molotov that sets an area on fire.

items.name: Air Strike
items.effect: Calls down a bombardment on a large rectangular area.

items.name: Napalm Strike
items.effect: Sets a large rectangular area on fire.

items.name: Big Boy
items.effect: Calls down a missile at the crosshair, causing a large explosion that leaves behind a large pool of poison creep. Increases curse by 1 while held.

items.name: Roll Bomb
items.effect: Dodge rolling leaves behind a bomb.

items.name: iBomb Companion App
items.effect: Detonates all explosives and explosive enemies in the room.

items.name: Supply Drop
items.effect: Single use. Spawns ammo box.

items.name: Ammo Synthesizer
items.effect: Adds a chance to regain ammo upon killing an enemy.

items.name: Armor Synthesizer
items.effect: Adds a chance to get armor upon completing a room.

items.name: Heart Synthesizer
items.effect: Adds a chance to get hearts upon completing a room.

items.name: Master of Unlocking
items.effect: Adds a chance to get keys upon completing a room.

items.name: Utility Belt
items.effect: Grants an extra active item slot and increases maximum ammo by 20%.

items.name: Macho Brace
items.effect: Shots are more powerful when coming out of a dodge roll.

items.name: Hidden Compartment
items.effect: Grants an extra active item slot and increases maximum ammo by 10%.

items.name: Backpack
items.effect: Allows the player to hold an extra active item.

items.name: Loot Bag
items.effect: Enemies drop more money, but the player drops money upon taking damage. Selling other items to the Sell Creep grants twice as much money.

items.name: Drill
items.effect: If used on a locked chest, forces the player to fight two waves of enemies and unlocks the chest if they survive. If used on a locked door, opens it for free.

items.name: Clown Mask
items.effect: Summons a random familiar with a clown mask who either stuns enemies, protects the player with mini blanks, or attacks enemies with a shotgun. An additional familiar is spawned for each additional Payday item the player has.

items.name: Scope
items.effect: Decreases bullet spread by 60%.

items.name: Scouter
items.effect: Shows enemy health and damage done. Increases damage and accuracy. Increases curse by 1.

items.name: Laser Sight
items.effect: Decreases bullet spread by 50% and adds a red laser sight to the player's weapons.

items.name: Ammo Belt
items.effect: Increases maximum ammo by 20%.

items.name: Bullet Time
items.effect: Slows down time while active.

items.name: Aged Bell
items.effect: Briefly stops enemies and enemy bullets. Can be used to steal from shops.

items.name: Singularity
items.effect: Spawns a black hole that attracts enemies and bullets.

items.name: Decoy
items.effect: Places a decoy that enemies will target. The decoy will be destroyed after taking enough damage. Can be used to steal from shops.

items.name: Shadow Clone
items.effect: Creates a copy of the player that mimics their movements in reverse and fires alongside them.

items.name: Explosive Decoy
items.effect: Places a decoy that enemies will target. The decoy will explode after taking enough damage. Can be used to steal from shops.

items.name: Melted Rock
items.effect: Causes enemy corpses to explode on use.

items.name: Trusty Lockpicks
items.effect: Has a 50% chance to unlock a lock or locked chest. If it fails, the lock will no longer function.

items.name: Smoke Bomb
items.effect: Temporarily become invisible to enemies. Can be used to steal from the Shop.

items.name: Box
items.effect: If the player enters a room while under the box, enemies will not target the player. Firing a weapon will remove the box. Has no effect if used while enemies are already targeting the player. Can be used to steal items from shops.

items.name: Fortune's Favor
items.effect: While active, bullets will curve around the player.

items.name: Jar of Bees
items.effect: Spawns bees that home in on and damage enemies.

items.name: Potion of Lead Skin
items.effect: While active, the player reflects enemy bullets.

items.name: Double Vision
items.effect: While active, doubles the player's bullets.

items.name: Chest Teleporter
items.effect: Teleports a chest to the next floor, with a chance to upgrade its quality.

items.name: Relodestone
items.effect: Halves reload times. While active, the player absorbs enemy bullets and regains ammo.

items.name: Poison Vial
items.effect: Creates a pool of poison creep.

items.name: Potion of Gun Friendship
items.effect: While active, increases damage, fire rate, knockback, and reload speed.

items.name: Portable Turret
items.effect: Places a stationary turret that shoots at enemies. The turret will be destroyed if it takes enough damage.

items.name: Knife Shield
items.effect: Creates a ring of knives around the player that damage enemies and block enemy bullets. Knives vanish after taking enough damage. If used again while the shield is active, the knives are launched forward. Increases curse by 1 while held.

items.name: Grappling Hook
items.effect: Allows players to hook onto and then pull themselves towards walls at a fast speed. Hitting enemies with the hook will deal minor damage and stun them for a short duration. Allows players to steal items from the shop. The hook has an unlimited range.

items.name: Stuffed Star
items.effect: While active, the player is invincible.

items.name: Boomerang
items.effect: Throws a boomerang that travels around the room and attempts to stun all enemies.

items.name: Shield of the Maiden
items.effect: Pulls up a shield to protect players from bullets. Players are immobile while using the shield.

items.name: Crisis Stone
items.effect: The player is invulnerable while reloading an empty magazine.

items.name: Portable Table Device
items.effect: Spawns a small table that can be flipped.

items.name: Daruma
items.effect: Can be used immediately after dodging a bullet to activate a blank effect.

items.name: Partially-Eaten Cheese
items.effect: While active, the player is invincible and instantly kills enemies they come in contact with.

items.name: +1 Bullets
items.effect: Increases damage by 25%.

items.name: Rocket-Powered Bullets
items.effect: Increases the player's bullet speed by 50%, increases damage by 10%, and increases rate of fire by 10%.

items.name: Shock Rounds
items.effect: Creates a beam of electricity between fired bullets.

items.name: Devolver Rounds
items.effect: Bullets have a chance to devolve enemies into simpler enemies.

items.name: Vorpal Bullets
items.effect: Whenever the player fires, occasionally fires a special high-damage bullet.

items.name: Katana Bullets
items.effect: Upon killing an enemy, bullets have a chance to unleash a flurry of slashes along the path of the original bullet, damaging enemies. Increases curse by 1.

items.name: Hungry Bullets
items.effect: Adds a chance for the player's bullets to block enemy projectiles, growing in damage and size as they do so.

items.name: Heavy Bullets
items.effect: Increases damage by 25% and doubles knockback but halves bullet speed.

items.name: Bouncy Bullets
items.effect: Grants bullets the ability to bounce off objects.

items.name: Explosive Rounds
items.effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that explode upon hitting an enemy or object.

items.name: Ghost Bullets
items.effect: Bullets pass through enemies and obstacles.

items.name: Alpha Bullet
items.effect: The first shot of a weapon's magazine will deal 80% more damage.

items.name: Omega Bullets
items.effect: The final shot of each magazine deals double damage.

items.name: Scattershot
items.effect: Guns fire a spread of tripled bullets which deal less damage.

items.name: Irradiated Lead
items.effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that poison enemies.

items.name: Hot Lead
items.effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that ignite enemies.

items.name: Battery Bullets
items.effect: Causes water that bullets pass over to become electrified, damaging enemies. Decreases shot spread by 50%.

items.name: Frost Bullets
items.effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that freeze enemies.

items.name: Charming Rounds
items.effect: Adds a chance to fire bullets that charm enemies.

items.name: Magic Bullets
items.effect: Grants all of the player's bullets a small chance to transmogrify enemies into chickens.

items.name: Fat Bullets
items.effect: Doubles bullet size and knockback, increases damage by 30%, and decreases maximum ammo by 10%.

items.name: Angry Bullets
items.effect: Hitting an enemy refires the projectile at a nearby enemy.

items.name: Blank Bullets
items.effect: Projectile impacts can trigger a short range blank. Increases curse by 1.5.

items.name: Orbital Bullets
items.effect: Missed shots orbit the player.

items.name: Homing Bullets
items.effect: Bullets have a chance to home in on enemies.

items.name: Shadow Bullets
items.effect: Firing a weapon has a chance to fire an additional projectile.

items.name: Easy Reload Bullets
items.effect: Dodge rolling reloads one bullet.

items.name: Stout Bullets
items.effect: Increases damage at close range and decreases as bullets travel.

items.name: Snowballets
items.effect: Bullets increase in size and damage as they travel.

items.name: Remote Bullets
items.effect: Fired bullets curve towards the player's crosshair. Increases damage by 10%.

items.name: Zombie Bullets
items.effect: Adds a chance to refund ammo when a shot misses.

items.name: Flak Bullets
items.effect: Whenever a bullet hits an enemy or wall, it splits into several smaller, lower-damage bullets.

items.name: Silver Bullets
items.effect: Increases damage to jammed enemies by 225% and Increases damage to bosses by 25%.

items.name: Gilded Bullets
items.effect: Increases damage based on the amount of money the player has.

items.name: Platinum Bullets
items.effect: Increases damage and fire rate with every bullet that hits an enemy.

items.name: Chaos Bullets
items.effect: Adds random bullet effects to the player's bullets.

items.name: Cursed Bullets
items.effect: Increases damage depending on how much curse the player has. Increases curse by 1 while held.

items.name: Chance Bullets
items.effect: Upon firing, adds a chance to fire projectiles from the player's other guns.

items.name: Helix Bullets
items.effect: Doubles fired bullets and makes them move in a helix pattern, but slightly decreases damage.

items.name: Bumbullets
items.effect: Upon firing, adds a chance to fire a bee, which homes in on and damages enemies.

items.name: Bloody 9mm
items.effect: Adds a chance to fire a fast, homing bullet that flies around the room damaging enemies.

items.name: Bionic Leg
items.effect: Increases movement speed and grants a piece of armor.

items.name: Shotgun Coffee
items.effect: Increases movement speed.

items.name: Shotga Cola
items.effect: Increases movement speed.

items.name: Ballistic Boots
items.effect: Increases movement speed.

items.name: Magic Sweet
items.effect: Grants a heart container, increases damage by 15%, increases movement speed, and increases coolness by 1.

items.name: Disarming Personality
items.effect: Decreases shop prices by 15%.

items.name: Mustache
items.effect: Heals the player half a heart upon purchasing an item.

items.name: Lichy Trigger Finger
items.effect: Increases rate of fire by 25%.

items.name: Lich's Eye Bullets
items.effect: Makes all guns act as if they have all their synergies.

items.name: Enraging Photo
items.effect: Taking damage makes the player briefly deal double damage and instantly reloads their weapon.

items.name: Ballot
items.effect: Increases the player's coolness by 3, which decreases the cooldown of active items and increases luck.

items.name: Live Ammo
items.effect: Provides immunity to contact damage, and dodge rolls deal increased damage to enemies.

items.name: Eyepatch
items.effect: Increases damage by 35% but decreases accuracy.

items.name: Military Training
items.effect: Increases weapon accuracy and reload speed.

items.name: Ring of the Resourceful Rat
items.effect: Once per floor, if the Resourceful Rat takes an item or gun, he will give another item or gun of equal quality in return. Unused trades carry over to subsequent floors.

items.name: Cartographer's Ring
items.effect: New floors have a chance to be mapped out.

items.name: Amulet of the Pit Lord
items.effect: Falling into pits no longer deals damage.

items.name: Ring of Fire Resistance
items.effect: Grants immunity to fire.

items.name: Ring of Miserly Protection
items.effect: Grants two heart containers. Disappears upon spending money.

items.name: Unity
items.effect: Increases damage based on the other guns the player has.

items.name: Ring of Chest Vampirism
items.effect: Breaking chests heals the player.

items.name: Cloranthy Ring
items.effect: Greatly shortens the time at the end of a dodge roll where the player is vulnerable.

items.name: Ring of Chest Friendship
items.effect: Increases the chance of finding chests.

items.name: Ring of Mimic Friendship
items.effect: Chests will not turn into Mimics.

items.name: Ring of Triggers
items.effect: Using an active item fires the currently held weapon in all directions.

items.name: Ring of Ethereal Form
items.effect: While active, the player is invincible and has flight. Allows user to steal items from shops.

items.name: Gundromeda Strain
items.effect: Decreases health of all enemies encountered by 25%.

items.name: Broccoli
items.effect: Increases damage by 10%, adds a 10% chance to negate damage, and increases movement speed.

items.name: Crutch
items.effect: Causes bullets to slightly curve towards enemies.

items.name: Spice
items.effect: Single use. Increases certain stats upon use, depending on how many times it has been used. Each time a spice cube is used, more spice cubes will spawn in place of items or pickups.

items.name: Liquid Valkyrie
items.effect: Decreases enemy bullet speed by 20%.

items.name: Bloody Eye
items.effect: Decreases enemy bullet speed by 15%.

items.name: Gunknight Helmet
items.effect: Grants two pieces of armor upon pickup and one piece of armor every floor.

items.name: Gunknight Greaves
items.effect: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

items.name: Gunknight Gauntlet
items.effect: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

items.name: Gunknight Armor
items.effect: Grants a piece of armor upon pickup and another piece of armor every floor.

items.name: Old Knight's Shield
items.effect: Grants two pieces of armor.

items.name: Old Knight's Helm
items.effect: Grants two pieces of armor.

items.name: Old Knight's Flask
items.effect: Heals the player for one heart upon use. Gains 2 charges each floor.

items.name: Old Crest
items.effect: Grants a piece of armor. Consumed upon taking any damage.

items.name: Armor of Thorns
items.effect: Provides immunity to contact damage, and increases damage dealt by dodge rolling into enemies. Grants armor upon pickup.

items.name: Full Metal Jacket
items.effect: Automatically activates one of the player's blanks when they are about to take damage.

items.name: Ticket
items.effect: Summons Gatling Gull as a temporary ally.

items.name: Heavy Boots
items.effect: Prevents the player from being affected by enemy knockback, gun recoil, and conveyor belts.

items.name: Bug Boots
items.effect: Dodge rolling leaves a trail of poison creep. Makes the player immune to poison.

items.name: Gunboots
items.effect: Dodge rolling fires a spread of five bullets backwards. Slightly increases movement speed.

items.name: Springheel Boots
items.effect: Allows the player to roll again mid-roll.

items.name: Rat Boots
items.effect: Grants temporary invulnerability and flight when the player steps over a pit.

items.name: Coin Crown
items.effect: Increases the chance to find  shells upon completing rooms.

items.name: Oiled Cylinder
items.effect: Halves reload time.

items.name: Ice Cube
items.effect: Reduces the cooldown timer of active items. Increases coolness by 3.

items.name: Rolling Eye
items.effect: Rolling through bullets reflects them at enemies.

items.name: Cigarettes
items.effect: Damages the player for half a heart and increases their coolness by 1 per use. Coolness decreases the cooldown of active items and increases luck.

items.name: Magazine Rack
items.effect: Place to create a zone of infinite ammo.

items.name: Charm Horn
items.effect: Charms enemies around the player upon use. Can be used to steal from shops.

items.name: Cog of Battle
items.effect: When reloading, pressing reload again when the indicator passes a certain mark on the reload bar will instantly reload the weapon, decreasing the reload time and increasing the damage and accuracy of the next magazine.

items.name: Metronome
items.effect: Grants a damage bonus for each enemy killed. The bonus is reset if the player takes damage or changes guns.

items.name: Honeycomb
items.effect: Taking damage spawns bees that seek out and damage enemies.

items.name: Map
items.effect: Reveals the entire map for the current floor.

items.name: Gungeon Blueprint
items.effect: Reveals all floor-maps for the rest of the run.

items.name: Sense of Direction
items.effect: Points in the direction of the floor's exit.

items.name: Duct Tape
items.effect: Single use. Combines 2 guns by granting one gun the projectiles that the other gun fires.

items.name: Gungeon Pepper
items.effect: Deals damage to nearby enemies.

items.name: Antibody
items.effect: Adds a chance to heal the player for an extra half a heart whenever they receive healing.

items.name: Resourceful Sack
items.effect: Rolling through bullets collects them in the sack. Using the sack empties the sack and fires a piece of explosive cheese for every bullet collected. Grants 3 extra active item slots.

items.name: Pink Guon Stone
items.effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Grants one extra heart container.

items.name: White Guon Stone
items.effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Grants an extra blank per floor.

items.name: Orange Guon Stone
items.effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Shoots at enemies.

items.name: Clear Guon Stone
items.effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Negates poison damage.

items.name: Green Guon Stone
items.effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Chance to heal upon taking damage.

items.name: Red Guon Stone
items.effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Improves dodging.

items.name: Blue Guon Stone
items.effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Upon taking damage, briefly slows time.

items.name: Glass Guon Stone
items.effect: Orbits the player, blocking enemy shots on contact. Destroyed upon taking damage.

items.name: Iron Coin
items.effect: 3 uses. Kills all enemies in a random room on the floor. Increases coolness by 2 and grants a 20% discount at shops while held.

items.name: Super Hot Watch
items.effect: Slows down time immensely while standing still. Moving speeds up time back to normal.

items.name: Drum Clip
items.effect: Increases the magazine size of all weapons by 50%.

items.name: Holey Grail
items.effect: Upon taking damage, triggers a blank effect and refills 50% of the ammo of all the player's guns. Increases curse by 1.

items.name: Blood Brooch
items.effect: Heals the player after dealing 1200 damage to enemies. Increases Curse by 1.

items.name: Backup Gun
items.effect: With each shot fired, a second bullet will be fired in the opposite direction that the player is aiming.

items.name: Sunglasses
items.effect: Slows down time and increases dodge power during explosions. Increases coolness by 2.

items.name: Mimic Tooth Necklace
items.effect: Every chest is guaranteed to be a Mimic.

items.name: Escape Rope
items.effect: Teleport out of the current room into the shop of the current floor.

items.name: Jetpack
items.effect: Can be toggled. While active, the player has increased movement speed and flight, but cannot dodge roll. Passing over puddles of oil will set them on fire.

items.name: Wax Wings
items.effect: Grants flight.

items.name: Cat Bullet King Throne
items.effect: Shoots miniature bullets upon rolling and grants flight.

items.name: Blast Helmet
items.effect: Decreases the radius that explosions will hurt the player in. Grants immunity to contact damage.

items.name: Lament Configurum
items.effect: Upon use, spawns several enemies and has a chance to spawn a gun or item. Increases curse by 1 while held.

items.name: Monster Blood
items.effect: Taking damage spawns a pool of poison creep. Grants immunity to poison creep and a heart container.

items.name: Nanomachines
items.effect: Grants two pieces of armor upon pickup. Grants a piece of armor every 4 times damage is taken.

items.name: Seven-Leaf Clover
items.effect: Increases the quality of chests found in chest rooms to an equal chance of red or black.

items.name: Number 2
items.effect: Boosts stats when alone. Only available in co-op, where The Cultist starts with this item.

items.name: Gold Ammolet
items.effect: Increases blank damage. Grants an extra blank per floor.

items.name: Chaos Ammolet
items.effect: Blanks have a chance to poison, freeze, and ignite enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

items.name: Lodestone Ammolet
items.effect: Increases the knockback of blanks. Grants an extra blank per floor.

items.name: Uranium Ammolet
items.effect: Blanks have a chance to poison enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

items.name: Copper Ammolet
items.effect: Blanks have a chance to ignite enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

items.name: Frost Ammolet
items.effect: Blanks have a chance to freeze enemies. Grants an extra blank per floor.

items.name: Table Tech Sight
items.effect: Flipping a table briefly slows down time and triple the player's shots.

items.name: Table Tech Money
items.effect: Flipping a table flips all other tables in the room, and flipping a table has a chance to spawn money.

items.name: Table Tech Rocket
items.effect: Flipping a table causes it to launch forward and explode.

items.name: Table Tech Shotgun
items.effect: Tables release a homing shotgun blast of bullets when flipped.

items.name: Table Tech Heat
items.effect: Flipping a table creates a large area in which all enemies will be set on fire.

items.name: Table Tech Rage
items.effect: Flipping a table briefly doubles the player's damage.

items.name: Table Tech Blanks
items.effect: Flipping a table activates a free blank.

items.name: Table Tech Stun
items.effect: Flipping a table briefly stuns nearby enemies.

items.name: Heart Holster
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Heart Lunchbox
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Heart Locket
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Heart Bottle
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Heart Purse
items.effect: Grants a heart container.

items.name: Ruby Bracelet
items.effect: Thrown guns will explode.

items.name: Sixth Chamber
items.effect: Decreases the cooldown time of active items by 5% for each point of Curse the player has. Inverts the usual curse penalty towards getting a room clear reward, making room rewards 2% more common for each point of Curse the player has.Increases curse by 2 while held.

items.name: Busted Television
items.effect: Upon use, the television is thrown in the direction of the cursor. Dropped upon dodge rolling.

items.name: Coolant Leak
items.effect: Sprays water forward.

items.name: Heart of Ice
items.effect: Grants a heart container. Taking damage releases bouncing ice bullets. Increases coolness by 1.

items.name: Ancient Hero's Bandana
items.effect: Quadruples maximum ammo.

items.name: Bloodied Scarf
items.effect: Replaces the dodge roll with a teleport. Increases reload speed.

items.name: Muscle Relaxant
items.effect: Decreases bullet spread by 66%.

items.name: Hip Holster
items.effect: Reloading a weapon fires it once for free.

items.name: Clone
items.effect: Upon death, the player is revived in the starting room of the first floor, retaining all items and guns.

items.name: Sponge
items.effect: Removes all liquids near the player and allows the player to understand Professor Goopton

items.name: Gas Mask
items.effect: Grants immunity to poison.

items.name: Hazmat Suit
items.effect: Grants immunity to fire, poison, and electricity.

items.name: Book of Chest Anatomy
items.effect: Improves the contents of broken chests.

items.name: Gun Soul
items.effect: Adds a heart container. Upon death, the player respawns at the start of the current floor with one heart container. All enemies previously killed will respawn, and if the player reaches the location where they died, they will return to normal.

items.name: Shelleton Key
items.effect: Allows any chest or lock to be opened without using a key. Increases curse by 1 while held.

items.name: Brick of Cash
items.effect: Reveals secret rooms.

items.name: Battle Standard
items.effect: Increases the damage of companions and charmed enemies.

items.name: Wingman
items.effect: Orbits the player, firing rockets at enemies.

items.name: Wolf
items.effect: Chases and bites enemies.

items.name: Dog
items.effect: Follows the player around, occasionally digs up a pickup upon completing a room, and barks at mimic chests.

items.name: Owl
items.effect: Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies and occasionally using short-ranged blanks.

items.name: Super Space Turtle
items.effect: Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies.

items.name: Junk
items.effect: Has no effect on its own. Often spawned by destroying chests.

items.name: Gold Junk
items.effect: Grants 500  on pickup.

items.name: Lies
items.effect: No effect.

items.name: Ser Junkan
items.effect: Summons Ser Junkan, who follows the player, attacks enemies, and becomes stronger for each Junk picked up.

items.name: R2G2
items.effect: Follows the player, firing bullets at enemies.

items.name: Baby Good Shelleton
items.effect: Follows the player and attacks enemies with a green laser.

items.name: Badge
items.effect: Summons a police officer that follows the player, firing bullets at enemies. Can be talked to. Can die after taking too much damage. Talking to him after he dies increases the player's damage by 20% and curse by 2.

items.name: Chicken Flute
items.effect: Summons a chicken that follows the player and blocks bullets. After taking a certain amount of damage, it summons an army of chickens to attack enemies.

items.name: Space Friend
items.effect: Follows the player, firing lasers at enemies and blocking enemy bullets.

items.name: Pig
items.effect: Upon death, instantly revives the player with full health.

items.name: Turkey
items.effect: Recovers 1 ammo after landing three sequential hits.

items.name: Turtle Problem
items.effect: Clearing a room spawns a turtle companion. Turtles block enemy bullets and die after taking enough damage.

items.name: Sprun
items.effect: Temporarily transforms into Windgunner under special circumstances.

items.name: Baby Good Mimic
items.effect: If no other familiars are present, follows the player and attacks enemies. If familiars are present, transforms into another one of the player's familiars.

items.name: Blank Companion's Ring
items.effect: Activates a blank each time an active item is used.

items.name: Briefcase of Cash
items.effect: Grants 250  and 3 .

items.name: Galactic Medal of Valor
items.effect:
Deal more damage to Bosses.
Increases reload speed and accuracy.

items.name: Bullet Idol
items.effect: Deals 45 damage to enemies upon taking damage.

items.name: Riddle of Lead
items.effect: Grants a heart container, fully heals the player, increases damage by 30%, increases dodge roll speed by 15%, increases movement speed by 10%, and adds a chance to negate damage.

items.name: Bracket Key
items.effect: Deals a large amount of damage to all enemies in a room. Increases curse by 1 while held.

items.name: Elder Blank
items.effect: Activates a blank. Increases curse by 2 while held.

items.name: Teleporter Prototype
items.effect: Teleports the player to a random room.

items.name: Yellow Chamber
items.effect: Grants 2 heart containers. Upon entering a room, there is a chance that an enemy will be charmed for the duration of the room. Increases fire rate by 15%. Increase curse by 2 while held.

items.name: Infuriating Note
items.effect: Useless on its own. Has six variants, each of which reveals one of the directions necessary to make it through the maze in the Resourceful Rat's Lair.

items.name: Red Crown
items.effect: Transforms the current Gungeoneer into The Lamb when collected, removing all held equipment and replacing it with the Crusader's Blade.Once per run, revives the player from death with two hearts after taking fatal damage.
